channel.title: Poopspraises on Kevin Li
channel.description: Recent content in Poopspraises on Kevin Li

item.title: Unicorn Store
item.description: This week, we return back to good old Netflix to find our movie to watch, as well as bring back another edition of “Poops & Praises”, a style of review where I just list what I liked (praises) and what I didn’t like (poops). Warning, there are mild spoilers ahead.

item.title: Captain Marvel

item.title: Destination Wedding

item.title: To All the Boys I've Loved Before
item.description: This week’s review follows a different format called “Poops and Praises” where I just list what I liked (praises) and what I didn’t like (poops). However, before I get into that:
